document_data.name: ''Robe of Summer''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''robe of summer''''' was an set of magical [[robe]]s that offered some level of protection to the wearer.
document_data.Description: The robe was woven from especially thin fabric that was pleasantly warm on the skin.
document_data.Powers: Anyone who wore a ''robe of summer'' gained inherent physical resistance to ice, frost, and other forms of extreme cold, whether mundane or magical in nature.
